document.full_text: unpopular japanese prime minister naoto kan faces fresh pressure to quit after his ruling party's losses in local elections on sunday, weakening his clout as he struggles to contain a nuclear crisis and find ways to finance post-quake rebuilding.
document.title: japan pm under pressure after party falters in local polls
lines_and_colors: unpopular japanese prime minister naoto kan faces fresh pressure to quit after his ruling party's losses in local elections on sunday, weakening his clout as he struggles to contain a nuclear crisis and find ways to finance post-quake rebuilding.
